basics.name: Kenneth Kebaara
basics.label: Full-Stack Software Developer, Data Analyst & Technology Entrepreneur
basics.summary:
Dynamic full-stack software developer, data analyst, and technology entrepreneur with 10+ years of experience architecting scalable web and mobile applications. Expertise spans React Native, Firebase, Ruby on Rails, modern JavaScript frameworks, and advanced data analytics.

As founder of USA2Kenya and co-founder of WellVue, I deliver innovative, user-focused solutions that seamlessly connect technology with business strategy. Passionate about solving real-world challenges and creating applications that drive user engagement and accelerate business growth.

Specialize in building cross-platform mobile applications, scalable web platforms, and data-driven solutions that transform businesses and enhance user experiences.

education.institution: University of St Thomas, Minneapolis, MN
Miami Ad School, South Beach, FL
University of St Thomas, Minneapolis, MN

work.summary: Founded and led development of a comprehensive resident engagement platform transforming property management through mobile-first experiences. Built from concept to production serving 50+ properties and 5,000+ residents.
highlights: Architected and built scalable React Native application serving multiple property types with real-time communication and push notifications
Implemented Firebase backend architecture supporting thousands of users with 99.9% uptime and sub-200ms response times
Reduced property management response times by 60% through automated workflows, digital maintenance requests, and resident communication tools
Led product strategy and technical architecture decisions for rapid market expansion across residential, commercial, and student housing sectors
Integrated payment processing, document management, and community features increasing resident engagement by 40%
Managed full development lifecycle from MVP to production deployment with continuous integration and automated testing

work.summary: Developed comprehensive fitness platform enabling personal trainers to scale their business through digital transformation. Delivered custom solution serving 200+ active users with 95% client satisfaction.
highlights: Built custom WordPress platform with interactive workout builders, progress tracking, and client management system
Integrated Stripe payment processing for seamless subscription and package billing, increasing revenue by 35%
Implemented video streaming optimization for exercise demonstrations and tutorials with CDN integration
Increased client retention rates by 25% through consistent digital engagement tools and automated follow-ups
Developed responsive design ensuring optimal user experience across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices
Created analytics dashboard providing insights into client engagement and program effectiveness

work.summary: Developed responsive marketing solutions positioning businesses in front of qualified customers through strategic digital presence. Delivered 50+ client websites with measurable performance improvements.
highlights: Developed responsive websites with cross-browser and cross-device compatibility using modern HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript frameworks
Implemented SEO strategies and technical optimizations increasing organic traffic by 150% and improving Core Web Vitals scores
Managed ongoing website maintenance including content updates, security patches, and performance optimizations
Collaborated with marketing teams to align technical solutions with business objectives and conversion goals
Built custom WordPress themes and plugins tailored to client needs and industry requirements
Integrated analytics tracking and conversion optimization tools resulting in 30% average improvement in lead generation

work.summary: Founded and built innovative e-commerce platform providing US mailing addresses for international shoppers, successfully serving hundreds of customers globally. Achieved 40% month-over-month growth and processed $500K+ in package forwarding volume.
highlights: Architected and developed full-stack Ruby on Rails application with integrated payment processing and inventory management
Implemented complex logistics system managing international package forwarding with real-time tracking and customs documentation
Built comprehensive customer management system handling user onboarding, payments, support tickets, and account management
Successfully scaled business from concept to profitable operation with global customer base across 15+ countries
Developed automated shipping calculations, customs duty estimation, and package consolidation algorithms
Integrated with major shipping carriers (FedEx, UPS, DHL) and payment processors (Stripe, PayPal) for seamless operations

work.summary: Developed innovative mobile application creating real photo emojis, managing cloud infrastructure and user-generated content.
highlights: Built mobile application for creating and sharing personalized photo emojis
Maintained AWS cloud infrastructure ensuring data integrity and system reliability
Collaborated on product development and feature ideation for user engagement
Managed company website serving as primary marketing channel for app promotion

work.summary: Contributed to healthcare software solutions development in agile environment, focusing on CRM applications and user communication systems.
highlights: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop healthcare-based software solutions
Worked in agile development environment delivering features according to business requirements
Built CRM application with SMS integration for automated user communication and data storage
Participated in code reviews and knowledge sharing to maintain high development standards

certificates.name: Certified Professional Project Manager
certificates.summary: Earned certification demonstrating expertise in project management principles, methodologies, and practices, including planning, execution, and closing projects.

certificates.name: Gen AI School
certificates.summary: Participated in an immersive AI training program focused on Large Language Models (LLMs) and Google Cloud AI solutions. Developed AI-driven prototypes and applications, gaining insights into AI infrastructure and ethical practices.

certificates.name: Software Engineering Certification
certificates.summary: Completed intensive full-stack software engineering program. Gained hands-on experience in React, Python, SQL, building applications and practicing agile methodologies.

certificates.name: Cloud Data Analytics Certification
certificates.summary: Completed certification covering cloud data analysis (collection, processing, storage, analysis, visualization) using BigQuery, Cloud Storage, and Looker. Demonstrated proficiency in SQL and building BI dashboards.

certificates.name: Project Management Professional (PMP) Preparation
certificates.summary: Comprehensive project management training covering PMI methodologies and best practices.

certificates.name: Brand Strategy Certificate
certificates.summary: Strategic brand development and marketing communications certification.

volunteer.summary: Mentor aspiring developers and entrepreneurs in the Denver tech community through workshops and one-on-one guidance.
highlights: Conducted monthly workshops on React Native development and mobile app architecture
Mentored 15+ junior developers in career development and technical skill building
Spoke at local meetups and conferences about entrepreneurship and technology innovation
Volunteered at coding bootcamps providing technical guidance and career advice

volunteer.summary: Contributed to civic technology projects improving government services and community engagement.
highlights: Developed web applications for local government transparency and citizen engagement
Collaborated with civic leaders to identify technology solutions for community challenges
Built open-source tools for data visualization and public information access
